name: Best Spanish Rice
description: "The combination of picante sauce and chicken broth makes this easy recipe very tasty!"

steps: Heat oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in onion, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Mix rice into skillet, stirring often. When rice begins to brown, stir in chicken broth and salsa. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 20 minutes, until liquid has been absorbed.
